mapper.select: SELECT UI.UI_NUM, UI.UI_NAME, UI.UI_ID, UI.UI_PROFILE_IMG, UI.UG_NUM, UG.UG_NAME, UG.UG_DESC, UI.CREDAT, UI.CRETIM, UI.LMODAT, UI.LMOTIM FROM USER_INFO UI INNER JOIN POINT_INFO PI ON UI.UI_NUM = PI.UI_NUM INNER JOIN USER_GRADE UG ON UI.UG_NUM = UG.UG_NUM WHERE ug.ug_num = #{ugNum}
mapper.update: update USER_INFO set UI_NAME = #{uiName}, UI_ID = #{uiId}, UI_PWD = #{uiPwd}, UI_PROFILE_IMG = #{uiProfileImg} WHERE UI_NUM = #{uiNum}
